question: who sang how long has this been going on song
chain_of_thought_result: The song "How Long Has This Been Going On?" was originally written by George and Ira Gershwin for the musical "Rosalie" in 1928. Since then, it has been covered by various artists. Notably, it was famously sung by Ella Fitzgerald and Louis Armstrong in their collaborations. Additionally, it has been performed by other artists over the years, including Frank Sinatra and Diana Krall. If you are looking for a specific version or artist, please provide more details!
